images.description_en: TechTudo, one of Brazil's leading technology websites, highlighted my artwork inspired by the Pixar trend. The image, which reimagines the characters from O Auto da Compadecida in the Disney-Pixar animation style, was used as an example in an article about the trend of creating animated versions using artificial intelligence. The article guided readers on how to create their own Pixar-style images using Bing Image Creator.
